statements: SELECT id, username, post_text, sentiment_score, date_posted FROM social_media_data;
SELECT username, post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%happy%';
SELECT id, username, post_text FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT post_text FROM social_media_data WHERE DATE(date_posted) = '2022-02-14' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment WHERE id = 5;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaData WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY brand_name;
SELECT * FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT post_content FROM SocialMediaData WHERE sentiment_score = (SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) FROM SocialMediaData);

SELECT BrandSentimentAnalysis.brand_name, MarketingCampaigns.campaign_name, SocialMediaData.sentiment_score FROM BrandSentimentAnalysis LEFT JOIN MarketingCampaigns ON BrandSentimentAnalysis.id = MarketingCampaigns.id LEFT JOIN SocialMediaData ON MarketingCampaigns.id = SocialMediaData.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM BrandSentiment;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT brand_name, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM BrandSentiment GROUP BY brand_name;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY brand_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE LENGTH(post_content) > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentiment WHERE brand_name LIKE '%brand%' AND sentiment_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, brand_name ASC
SELECT post_id, likes_count, shares_count, comments_count FROM PostMetrics WHERE likes_count > 1000 AND shares_count > 500 ORDER BY post_id ASC
SELECT * FROM brand_sentiment;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date, post_author FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand_sentiment;
SELECT brand_name, sentiment_score FROM brand_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_author FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
